name: Real Boy
description:
With your new Ninetendio Real Boy™, experience reality like never before.

Move in both the real and virtual world to survive as long as possible. Make sure to collect batteries as well to keep the screen visible.

Made for Geta Game Jam 9, with the optional hardmode challenge of making every sound effect with my voice. (The music wasn't made with my voice, you can listen to that here.)
